Card Description:
As a new user, I want to register using my email and password so that I can create an account

Acceptance Criteria:

- Email validation
- Password strength check
- Account creation confirmation
- Social media login options

As a registered user, I want to log in securely so that I can access my grocery lists

Acceptance Criteria:

- Secure login with email/password
- Password reset functionality
- Remember me option
- Login error handling
- Session management

As a user, I want to create and manage my grocery lists so that I can organize my shopping needs

Acceptance Criteria:

- Create new grocery list
- Add/remove items to list
- Edit item quantities
- Name and save lists
- Delete lists
- Mark items as completed

As a user, I want to set up my preferences and dietary restrictions so that I receive personalized recommendations

Acceptance Criteria:

- Set dietary preferences (vegetarian, vegan, etc.)
- Set budget limits
- Choose preferred stores
- Add allergy information
- Save and update preferences

As a user, I want the app to learn from my shopping history so that I can receive personalized recommendations

Acceptance Criteria:

- Track user shopping patterns
- Analyze purchase history
- Generate basic product recommendations
- Consider user preferences in suggestions
- Learn from user acceptance/rejection of recommendations

As a user, I want to share my grocery lists with family members so that we can collaborate on shopping

Acceptance Criteria:

- Share lists with other users
- Set permissions (view/edit)
- Real-time updates for shared lists
- Notifications for list changes
- Remove sharing access

As a user, I want to plan my meals for the week so that I can automatically generate grocery lists

Acceptance Criteria:

- Create weekly meal plans
- Search and add recipes
- Automatically generate shopping lists from recipes
- Scale recipes by servings
- Save favorite meal plans
- Display nutritional information

As a user, I want to see real-time prices and availability from local stores so that I can optimize my shopping

Acceptance Criteria:

- Display current prices from local stores
- Show product availability
- Compare prices across stores
- Alert for special offers
- Store inventory updates

As a user, I want to navigate efficiently through the store so that I can complete my shopping quickly

Acceptance Criteria:

- Display store layout map
- Show optimal shopping route
- Provide aisle information
- Sort shopping list by store layout
- Real-time location tracking
- Rerouting based on item availability

As a user, I want intelligent product recommendations based on my patterns and preferences

Acceptance Criteria:

- Predictive shopping suggestions
- Price trend analysis
- Alternative product recommendations
- Seasonal item suggestions
- Budget optimization recommendations
- Smart reorder reminders

As a user, I want the app to predict my shopping needs based on my patterns so that I never run out of essentials

Acceptance Criteria:

- Analyze consumption patterns
- Predict when items need restocking
- Smart reminders for regular purchases
- Usage pattern visualization
- Automatic list generation based on patterns
- Adjustable prediction settings

As a user, I want enhanced integration features so that I can use the app more conveniently

Acceptance Criteria:

- Voice command support
- Smart home device integration
- Receipt scanning
- Export shopping data
- Integration with meal kit services
- Calendar sync for meal planning

Optimize system performance and user experience through technical improvements

Acceptance Criteria:

- Implement offline functionality
- Optimize app loading times
- Improve data synchronization
- Enhance battery efficiency
- Reduce data usage
- Implement caching strategy
- Optimize database queries
- Performance monitoring setup
